raw: * Send the given value to all writeable addresses known to this widget
* @param value {any} value to send
* @param filter {Function} optional filter function for addresses
* @param currentBusValues {Object} optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
*          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
*          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
*          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
*          for the encoded value
* @return {Object} the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Send the given value to all writeable addresses known to this widget

@param.name: @param
@param.body: filter {Function} optional filter function for addresses

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
currentBusValues {Object} optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
          for the encoded value
@param.description:
optional: the (assumed) last encoded values
          that were sent on the bus. When the encoding of the new value
          to send is equal to the currentBusValues a transmission will
          be suppressed. The object is a hash with the encoding as a key
          for the encoded value

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Object} the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time
@return.description: the object/hash of encoded values that were sent last time

raw: * Format the given value according to the defined format.
* If no format is defined the value will not be changed.
* @param address {String} KNX-GA or openHAB item name
* @param value {var} value to be formatted
* @return {var} the formatted value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Format the given value according to the defined format. If no format is defined the value will not be changed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: address {String} KNX-GA or openHAB item name

raw: * Create an action handling that shows a button press animation.
* When the action is not set, it will be searched for - so that widgets
* with bind_click_to_widget will also work.
* @param event {Event} pointerdown event

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create an action handling that shows a button press animation. When the action is not set, it will be searched for - so that widgets with bindclickto_widget will also work.
